name: Rusalka
damage_immunities: necrotic, poison; piercing and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

actions.name: Breathless Kiss
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: the target is grappled (escape DC 13) and the rusalka draws all the air from the target's lungs with a kiss. If the rusalka has movement remaining, she drags the grappled creature into deep water, where it begins suffocating.

actions.name: Drowning Hair (1/Day)
actions.desc: The rusalka's long hair tangles around a creature the rusalka has grappled. The creature takes 33 (6d10) necrotic damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Constitution saving throw. In addition, until it escapes the rusalka's grapple, it is restrained and has disadvantage on Strength checks to break free of the grapple.

special_abilities.name: Withered Tresses
special_abilities.desc: If a rusalka is kept out of water for 24 consecutive hours, its hair and body dry into desiccated swamp weeds and the creature is utterly destroyed.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the rusalka's innate casting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

at will: control water, suggestion, tongues, water walk (can be ended freely at will)

1/day: dominate person

special_abilities.name: Watery Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: In dim light or darkness, a rusalka that's underwater is invisible.
